instructions: On your Android phone or tablet, install Gboard . Open any app that you can type with, like Gmail or Keep. Tap an area where you can enter text. At the top of your keyboard, touch and hold Microphone . When you see "Speak now," say what you want written.

On your Android phone or tablet, open the document or message with the word you want to change. Touch and hold the word. At the top of your keyboard, tap Microphone . When you see "Speak now," say the new word.
